data.caption: Clarification Letter With Respect To Typo Error In The Results
data.news_body:
With reference to captioned subject, please be informed
that while submitting results for the quarter ended 31.12.2022 submitted by us on 23.01.2023 there is a typo error in the
consolidated financial results where in total of Net Segment revenue in December,2022 is reported as Rs. 791.59 Cr instead of Rs. 789.28 Cr. Further in year to date nine months
ended 31.12.2022 Net Segment revenue in December,2022 is reported as Rs. 2053.98 Cr instead of Rs. 2051.67 Cr.
We would like to further inform that it was a clerical error which was unintentional and not deliberate.
We are enclosing the revised results removing the above clerical error for your ready reference.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Board Meeting Held On 23Rd January, 2023
data.news_body:
The Board of Directors of the Company at their meeting held on Monday, 23rd January, 2023 considered and adopted the Un-Audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) of the Company for the Quarter ended 31st December, 2022 along with the Limited Review Report on the said results from the Statutory Auditors of the Company of even date.
The meeting of the Board of Directors commenced at 11:00 A.M. and concluded at 2:00 P.M.
